Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students
Evidence Statements: The student can depict a string telephone showing two students communicating over a long distance.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can show the use of specific materials provided, such as cups and string, in their design.
The student can identify features in their drawing that demonstrate the ability to communicate using sound over a long distance.
The student can include notes or labels to explain how the device works to solve the communication problem.
